trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hobbs
There were no other sightings in Hobbs on or around July 4th 2007
divs: Sighting Detailsit was a human like entity that my father-in-law and I observed coming down the street and then when it got close to us it disappeared. It had a glistening effect that could be described as glass like or cellophane like. This happened on July 4th, 2007.
